Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.controller

Class Game

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.controller.Game
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
Game class Controller of game Computed, stores and directs all game actions

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void keyMovementListener()
    Method that controls players movings listeners for player action player can move, put bombs and call pause menu there is tested if player press or released a key
    void moveEnemy()
    method that passes through enemies and change their position by their move mehcanics method controll free directions and choose free ways
    void removeEnemyfromList​(java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> enemies)
    method that remove death enemies
    java.lang.String serializeHashMap​(java.util.HashMap coordinates)
    method that serialize game coordinates to String for saving the game method of serialization is called from models and it is our own serialization
    java.lang.String serializeMap​(Map mapParams)
    Method that save map params for loading game
    javafx.stage.Stage setPauseMenu()
    method that call Pause menu
    void start()
    Method that set map and enemies start frame timer every frame controll collisions, movings, putting bombs and deaths check if player pause game
    void stopGameForLose()
    method that end game after loose
    void stopGameWin()
    method that end game for win
